title: Context-Aware Mobile Learning-Based Social Sector Job Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Foundational Knowledge in Social Sciences
context.additional_context: Environment enabling context-based learning utilizing individual mobile devices (tablets/smartphones)

learning_goals: Learners can enhance their ability to analyze social issues in contextual situations similar to actual job tasks by utilizing mobile devices.
Learners can complete collaborative projects in a ubiquitous learning environment that applies location- and context-aware technologies.
Learners can establish a learning improvement plan based on at least two real-time feedbacks per week through a smart device-LMS integrated system.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
